welcome.title: Welcome to our healthcare blockchain demo!
welcome.content: Log in as a different participant and consider the various functionalities that can be used.

home.title: Short demo for healthcare blockchain.
home.content:
Doctors can make prescriptions.
Patients can recieve online prescription with up to 18 medicines in it.
Pharmacies can check for online prescription and sell the prescribed medicines.
The goal is to avoid medicines fraud.
The doctor can't prescribe medicines for which doesn't have right. For example not legal or too expensive.
Fraudsters not to be able to falsify prescriptons. For examle fake prescriptions with free medicines and sell them after.
Patients not to rewrite prescriptions.
Pharmacies not to lie to the goverment that they have given more free and reduced medicines than they really did.
